item.description:
We're dancing at Playwright on Friday night!

We'll be meeting in the front half of the Playwright at 10pm. There's no cover charge. Music normally starts 10:30-ish.

If enough people want to get together before 10, that's possible...speak up!

If you can't find the group, text me when you arrive (203-901-4957).

We may well end up dancing in the back. If you're going to be late, if you text me before 10 that you are coming, I'll keep an extra eye out for you.

HOST: Jason, 203-901-4957 (noisy club, texting probably best)

PARKING: Here's a map of places
item.how_to_find_us: Look for someone tall (6'3"), and send a text!
item.name: Fri 1/29 - Dancing at Playwright!
